Text: APEx Conference Update is an opportunity to join colleagues from around the globe for a conference on relevant timely and strategic issues facing our industry Delegates and speakers from Asia Australia Europe and North and South Americas will be meeting in Canada in October to discuss issues that will shape electrical deregulation in the foreseeable future The conference is scheduled for October and in Kananaskis near Calgary Alberta Visit the APEx Conference web site at updatehtml for more details and an updated list of speakers and topics Registration space is limited Dont miss out Plan to be a part of this forum on significant issues and opportunities facing the electric industry as it moves through deregulation Any questions or inquiries should be forwarded to or by phone at or by fax at
